animeDescription: Expert linksman Akihiko joins the university golf club at the same time as maverick golfer Akikazu. The pair often tee off against each other, though Akikazu is distracted by the charms of his opponent's beautiful caddy, Misako.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Kamata Hidemi', ['Script']], ['Ikezawa Satoshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Takatou Kazushige', ['Art Director']], ['Okaseko Nobuhiro', ['Animation Director']]]
